abstract.t: This document defines HNEWS (HTTP News Protocol), an HTTP-tunnelingnews protocol. The NNTP(Network News Transfer Protocol) protocoldescribed in RFC 977 is recast as HTTP CGI (Common Gateway Interface)requests that may be filled by any server that supports CGI. Two newcommands are defined for connecting and disconnecting from an HNEWSserver. Also, a mechanism for session state management is described.This document assumes that you have a working knowledge of the CommonGateway Interface [2] for running executable content on a web server andsome familiarity with the NNTP news protocol [1].A new URL scheme has also been specified for HNEWS and is described ina separate document [5].
